alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 9:08PM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and sleet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph across the higher elevations. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Southern Berkshire County. In New York, Eastern Albany and Western Rensselaer Counties. * WHEN...Through 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates will likely range from a half inch to one inch per hour at times tonight before snow mixes with sleet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
